law.catch_line: Required review of CPTED principles prior to school construction or renovation.
law.text: The Kentucky Department of Education shall require a local board of education to review Crime Prevention Through Environment Design principles, or CPTED principles, when constructing a new school building or when renovating an existing school building.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 4, effective June 25, 2013; and ch. 133, sec. 4, effective June 25, 2013.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/25/2013). This statute was created with identical text in 2013 Ky. Acts chs. 126 and 133, which were companion bills. These Acts have been codified together.
